size_t operator() (const Reference *const key) const
 Produces a hashcode for the Reference pointed to by key. Since there may onbly be one Reference object for each reference the address will do.

Detailed Description

Function object used to create a hashcode for a Reference. Needed by hash_map.

Member Function Documentation

size_t hashReferenceP::operator() (  const Reference *const   key  )  const [inline]
 

Produces a hashcode for the Reference pointed to by key. Since there may onbly be one Reference object for each reference the address will do.

Parameters:
key Pointer to the Reference for which to create a hashcode.
Returns:
A hashcode for the specified Reference.
